overview: In 2014, more than 66,000 unaccompanied migrant kids were caught at the US border with Mexico. Some of them got there by riding the train known as 'La Bestia'. AJ+ followed 13-year-old Alfredo as his perilous journey came to an abrupt end.
tagline: Riding The 'Death Train' Changed This Boy's Life Forever
title: Riding the Beast
